text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump do those numbers include russian contractors and taliban bounty hunters ??

those jobs go away when #coronavirus resurgent and #America has to shut down again, but the cravenness and irresponsibility of this @POTUS* & @Trump style @GOP allies/enablers is forever...
